channel.title: [PI] Point System HELP! [PI]
channel.description: Okay Guys, I Am Trying To Make A Point System Where When you Kill A NPC It Gives You 2 Points.. I Really Don't Know How To Do This.. And After This I Am Going To Try And Make A Shop For This Point System, Can Anyone Please Help? Thanks Guys :)

item.title: [PI] Point System HELP! [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Abandoned_Dreams Abandoned Dreams
item.description:
@Abandoned_Dreams wrote:

[quote=“KrypitcRc, post:2, topic:378336”]public void dropItems

Under that add

if (npcs[i].npcType == NPC_ID) c.POINT_NAME += 1;

Might not work perfectly but it’ll point you in the right direction[/quote]Lol, IDK What Files To Put It In, Where At In That File, And Also… Please Tell Me How To Get To That File, I’M NEW TO PI!
Thanks Man.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Point System HELP! [PI]
item.dc:creator: @KrypitcRc KrypitcRc
item.description:
@KrypitcRc wrote:

In your NPCHandler.java search

public void dropItems

Under that add

if (npcs[i].npcType == NPC_ID) c.POINT_NAME += 2;

Might not work perfectly but it’ll point you in the right direction

Read full topic
